body:
Hey guys im (kind of) new here, I joined the website today and from now on I'm going to hopefully start playing regularly, but I have played before, 2 years ago. I decided to come here after I seen today that OCN (the server I used to play on all the time) will shut down, and this is the only other CTW, DTM, etc, server that I've ever enjoyed, so im going to play here now :D. 

Main goals on here is to get few objectives, and play in a tourney, something I never got to do on OCN [[LFT ;)  ]].

title: my introduction

replies.body: Hello and welcome we would like to test your skills for our team here's our LFM (where to apply) https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/d9321f610 I hope you enjoy ur stay here

replies.body:
Welcome back! If you have any questions or anything you can ask a staff member, we're all friendly! :)

Also you should join the Community Slack if you want to get acquainted to Avicus.
